actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to treat Puerto Rico on the same basis as States are treated under that title.

summary.text: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act to treat Puerto Rico on the same basis as a State for certain program allocations under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to treat Puerto Rico on the same basis as States are treated under that title.
